Subject: FW: United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (MN) [Request to Modify Protective 
Order 
(Under Seal)] 
Date: The, 18 Aug 2020 01:24:24 +0000 
Attachments: 2020.08.17_,ISP_Ltt_re._Modification_of the_Protective_Order.pdf; 
2020.08.17_,ISP_Rule_16.1_Affidavit.pdf; Ex._1.pdf; Ex._2.pdf; Ex._3.pdf; Ex._4.pdf;

From: 
Nicole Simmons 
Sent: Monday, August 17, 2020 8:01 PM 
To: 
Cc: Jeff Pagliuca Laura 
Menninger <EM:,  Ann Lundberg 
Subject: United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) [Request to Modify Protective Order (Under Seal)] 
Dear Judge Nathan, 
At the request of Jeffrey S. Pagliuca, please see attached Ms. Maxwell's Letter Motion, Affidavit, and accompanying 
exhibits filed under seal today August 17, 2020. 
Regards, 
Nicole 
Nicole Simmons 
Haddon, Morgan and 
Foreman, P.C. 
150 East 10th Avenue 
Denver, Colorado 
80203 
EFTA00018748
